name: Slug Pistol
effect: Attacks made with this weapon against targets that have Lock On ignore cover.

name: Revenge
effect: The first time an allied non-Grunt, non-Drone character within Range 5 is destroyed by a hostile character, the avenger gains {8/10/12} Overshield, and for the rest of the scene the Slug Pistol deals double damage (bonus damage is not doubled) and they gain +1 Accuracy on all attacks, checks, and saves.

name: Vanguard Armor
effect: The Avenger has Resistance to all damage while they are within Range 3 of an allied non-Grunt, non-Drone character. After Revenge is activated, this trait is disabled.

name: Erupting Shrapnel
effect:
1/round, after the Avenger makes a successful ranged attack, they may force their target to pass an Engineering save. On a failure, the target is embedded with explosive shrapnel, and they take {2/3/4} AP Explosive damage each time they make a ranged or melee attack roll until the end of their next turn. Affected targets are aware of this effect.

While Revenge is active, characters automatically fail this save, and each time the target makes a ranged or melee attack roll, they are also pushed 2 spaces in a direction of the Avenger's choice.
